website_summaries.verdict: The ultimate Pokémon TCG box set for Raichu fans, and the potential to get top-tier cards like Palkia, Mewtwo-GX, and Entei-GX.
pros: Includes special promo cards of Pikachu and Raichu-GX, an oversized Raichu-GX card, metallic Raichu coin, and 5 Shining Legends booster packs with 10 cards in each
cons: The Shining Legends series features just over 70 cards, so it’s easy to find doubles in this set

customer_reviews.title: Don’t know why everyone else is writing a bad review because they pulled duds
customer_reviews.text: Don’t know why everyone else is writing a bad review because they pulled duds, it’s pokemon cards everything’s random. Not the sellers fault, I got two great pulls from mine a full art and a shining
customer_reviews.author: Nate Dussault

customer_reviews.title: Getting the powerful Raichu cards and getting all the other cool Raichu card
customer_reviews.text: I got two Raichu cards! One was like a rainbow and one I also got was a really big wide card. They were so beautiful! I recommend you should buy this. I’m six years old.
customer_reviews.author: SkiMama

customer_reviews.title: my 11y old son loved it he said that it was the best pokemon ...
customer_reviews.text: my 11y old son loved it he said that it was the best pokemon pack ever that he got 4 legendary cards 4 gx that where foild dont know what that means but he was really happy
customer_reviews.author: Eve

customer_reviews.title: Unique Raichu Card!
customer_reviews.text: The oversized Raichu card is one of the best I’ve seen! The added detail and design to it definitely make it unique. You can’t beat getting a cute Pikachu card along with this set, too!
customer_reviews.author: A.S.

customer_reviews.title: Great Present for Pokemon lovers.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for a birthday and the birthday boy was very excited about it. Great for kids . He knew exactly what the characters were and was very happy with his present.
customer_reviews.author: TNguyen

customer_reviews.title: Great Pokemon Set, would purchase again!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son on sale, at $20 it was a great steal and apparently his cards he got from here were great. This is the second box of this I've purchased and it always seems to give him good cards.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy C.

customer_reviews.title: ripped off!
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these boxes, every single pack was opened already (picture included) some packs didn't come with the guaranteed rare card, it was replaced with the pikachu card that comes with the box (picture also included) its a real shame and possibly illegal that people would tamper with the boxes and resell them, advertising them as new.
customer_reviews.author: Derek

customer_reviews.title: A Well Repackaged Box
customer_reviews.text: Everything would have been great but each pack was open like the one pictured above and the box was re-glued shut. Almost every card in each pack was exactly the same. I think someone open the packs, repackaged it, then returned it as new.
customer_reviews.author: Anderson

customer_reviews.title: This came just liked it was described
customer_reviews.text: This came just liked it was described. Also opened a super secret rare Mewtwo from the box. My kids loved it. I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Rajajx

customer_reviews.title: It's a great set.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered two of these and didn't get a thing kinda sucks but this set is amazing but I get luckier picking them out at stores. If you can't go to the store get it here. If you can there 30 at target as of right now.
customer_reviews.author: Pablo

customer_reviews.title: Definitely Worth It!
customer_reviews.text: Got good pull. I enjoyed them very much. I finally got one of the rarest card mewtwo GX. Was bit icky about purchasing Pokémon box/boosters but, I checked to see if there any boosters that are tampered or not which no sign of it. I’m satisfied with it.
customer_reviews.author: Deaf07

customer_reviews.title: Not real
customer_reviews.text: Kid opened the cards and destroyed the damaged box so don't think we can return. But the cards are probably fake with all the uneven borders.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Product came opened
customer_reviews.text: Thai item came used and appeared to be opened prior.
customer_reviews.author: Allen

customer_reviews.title: Scam boxes
customer_reviews.text: Scam. Bought 2 boxes and literally all 10 packs were just holos. Do not buy. At least a shiny or better in a box. This was tampered with.
customer_reviews.author: Domingo

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift, very satisfied.
customer_reviews.text: Came in on time, in good condition. My daughter loved this set, came with a good amount of cards and some gx cards. And the giant Raichuu card is a hit.
customer_reviews.author: Aurora Russell

customer_reviews.title: Great pulls
customer_reviews.text: This Pokémon Shining Legends box set was great! Pulls were pretty good. It was better than expected. I would definitely repurchase this box.
customer_reviews.author: Pinkvenom626

customer_reviews.title: HORRIBLE!!
customer_reviews.text: This product litterbugs take 2 in a half weeks to arrive to you and pulls were horrible. The packages are tampered
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Item arrived damaged
customer_reviews.text: I received my package today and the box packaging looked tampered with so i prepared for the worst. Then i open the box and see a 6 inch razor blade gash through the backside of my "collection box." The collection box has wrinkles on it, and if i wanted a box in this condition, i would've ordered used products, not brand new ones. I'm not mad. But I'm not happy.
customer_reviews.author: Nickolas Taylor

customer_reviews.title: The Raichu full art and the overall packaging are beautiful! I didn’t get any pulls
customer_reviews.text: The Raichu full art and the overall packaging are beautiful! I didn’t get any pulls, but holos are guaranteed in every pack so I’m still satisfied with what I got.
customer_reviews.author: EL

customer_reviews.title: BUY BUY BUY!
customer_reviews.text: Shining legends was a surprisingly great set. We had 2 great pulls from this box and loved the promo.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Very cool
customer_reviews.text: Amazing gift, nephew got two full arts and the promos were awesome
customer_reviews.author: Tobias batés

customer_reviews.title: Kids loved it!
customer_reviews.text: Was a hit with the kids! They loved the giant collectible card too
customer_reviews.author: JEld

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth it
customer_reviews.text: The product was wonderful, and even had some good pulls.
customer_reviews.author: Shaundrea and Kiddos

customer_reviews.title: Absolute Scam
customer_reviews.text: All my packs were already opened and didn’t pull a single relatively good card. Do not buy an absolute scam
customer_reviews.author: sandra

customer_reviews.title: Damaged
customer_reviews.text: Box arrived damaged and the oversized card is bent. Cards on the inside were shook out of place
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Fernandez

customer_reviews.title: It's what's on the inside that counts
customer_reviews.text: For what's inside great. As for looks, that's something to be desired. The box it's torn in many places. Which is super awesome since its a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Jersey Curls

customer_reviews.title: Little bit disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Love the product that I ordered. I wish the product was not dented when it was shiped. Overall I do like the product but for a five star rating in my book would be a product with no dents to it.
customer_reviews.author: Wkateches

customer_reviews.title: Good cards!
customer_reviews.text: My son got a few good cards from this set. He was very happy!
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Coburn

customer_reviews.title: Best box you can get with $20
customer_reviews.text: Great for the price. I managed to pull a holo or better on all 5 booster packs. The best card I got was a mewtwo GX secret rare which already is worth $20.
customer_reviews.author: That One Guy

customer_reviews.title: Quick service!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time, and was exactly as expected. I got it as a gift for my daughter's brother from her, and he's going to love it!
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Overall great satisfaction
customer_reviews.text: Box came in great condition with no damage and I was very satisfied with the cards, even though I didn't get a lot of valuable or exciting cards but that is all just luck and came in time with the promo card in good condition
customer_reviews.author: Juan Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Do not buyyyy!!!!! Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY Obviously resealed It also came flattened like a pancake
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa

customer_reviews.title: Great deck
customer_reviews.text: My 8 year old was so excited to receive this deck. Has awesome assortment of cards.
customer_reviews.author: Estefan Salgado

customer_reviews.title: shining pulls!
customer_reviews.text: They hadn't been opened or anything like ive read in other reviews! I pulled very great card from only 4 boxes , definitely making money after sending the pulls to get graded.
customer_reviews.author: jazzyjay

customer_reviews.title: Great card pulls
customer_reviews.text: My hubby is a Pokeman collector and loved this release.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Diaz

customer_reviews.title: Pokémon Fans will love this.
customer_reviews.text: Great if you’re a Pokémon fan and a collector of rare cards.
customer_reviews.author: Alvin Merino

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: love the pin, had a few great pulls! fast shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Zubby Lorc

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I got two shining cards and a GX from the packs!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I’m really liking shining legends. I’ve pulled a pretty good amount of rare cards. Still hunting for shining Mew! Overall worth it for the 5 booster packs!
customer_reviews.author: Bryan P.

customer_reviews.title: Entei GX- full Art
customer_reviews.text: “Very Happy with this purchase Raichu GX box” Especially now having Entei GX full Art now added to my collection. I always liked Entei More than the other two legendary beast Pokémon .
customer_reviews.author: zoy wright

customer_reviews.title: Pokemon makes him happy
customer_reviews.text: My son didn't seem disappointed just had a lot of same cards he already had and guess he wanted Ex cards?
customer_reviews.author: Shortcake14

customer_reviews.title: Very nice product
customer_reviews.text: Had everything I expected; no tampering at all. Love the Raichu and Pikachu promo cards, very nice!
customer_reviews.author: Dorian Cates

customer_reviews.title: This is real
customer_reviews.text: Brand new, not resealed. I've also somehow pulled out a another Raichu Gx from a pack out of luck.
customer_reviews.author: Pokemon Lover

customer_reviews.title: Great set!
customer_reviews.text: I only bought one of these and got 2 ultra rare hits out of five.
customer_reviews.author: Zack Field

customer_reviews.title: Great Box
customer_reviews.text: Came just as described. Even got a few great pulls out of the awesome shining legends boosters.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Gift!!!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for a birthday gift and I’m so glad I did he loves all the cards there cool card in the package totally recommend it
customer_reviews.author: Dj Pelon Ent.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Happy with my purchase. I loved that I got shiny rayquaza in one of the packs!
customer_reviews.author: Ricardo R

customer_reviews.title: It's worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Package was only very slightly torn. Very much worth getting the warehouse version.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: RIGGED
customer_reviews.text: Bought this, shining legends lunch box tin, and zoroark pin collection box from this same seller and they were all duds.
customer_reviews.author: KJI

customer_reviews.title: Son loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My son's face when he was unpacking this present was priceless. It was a great gift from grandma. He loves everything about this set and the big glittery card was the absolute highlight. He enjoys battling with his friends!!
customer_reviews.author: Sinini

product_meta.title: Pokemon TCG: Shining Legends Special Collection Box Trading Card Set, 5 Booster Packs, 1 Rare Foil Raichu-GX Card, 1 Foil Pikachu Promo Card, 1 Oversize Foil & More
feature_bullets: Pokemon SM3. 5 shining legends Raichu GX SPMRNUM cocktails
Unleash ALL NEW POWER: An exclusive foil promo card featuring raichu-gx included with every GX box to strengthen your deck
Become THE GREATEST TRAINER: Will you find reshiram or mewtwo-gx?
Gotta catch them all: the Pokemon shining legends expansion brings over 70 brand new cards to collect. Will you find them all?
Show of your Pokemon pride: with a special oversized full art card and a collector's pin included
